languages.text: "Все это время вы были моим проводником в этом мире. Могла ли я отвернуться от вас в последний момент?"
"You have been my guide in this world this entire time. How could I turn my back on you at the last moment?"
languages.original_text: "Все это время вы были моим проводником в этом мире. Могла ли я отвернуться от вас в последний момент?"

traits.locale_text: "You have been my guide in this world this entire time. How can I turn my back on you at the last moment?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You have been my guide in this world this entire time. How could I turn my back on you at the last moment?"

traits.locale_text: "You have been my guide in this world this entire time. How could I turn my back on you at the last moment?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “你一直都是我在这世上的向导，我怎么可能在最后一刻背弃你呢？”
languages.original_text: "You have been my guide in this world this entire time. How could I turn my back on you at the last moment?"

traits.locale_text: “你一直都是我在这世上的向导，我怎么可能在最后一刻背弃你呢？”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Ha sido mi guía en este mundo durante todo este tiempo. ¿Cómo podría darle la espalda en el último momento?».
languages.original_text: "You have been my guide in this world this entire time. How could I turn my back on you at the last moment?"

traits.locale_text: «Ha sido mi guía en este mundo durante todo este tiempo. ¿Cómo podría darle la espalda en el último momento?».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「陛下はこの世界でずっとあたくしを導いてくださいました。最後の瞬間になってお見捨てするはずはありませんでしょう？」
languages.original_text: "You have been my guide in this world this entire time. How could I turn my back on you at the last moment?"

traits.locale_text: 「陛下はこの世界でずっとあたくしを導いてくださいました。最後の瞬間になってお見捨てするはずはありませんでしょう？」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr wart die ganze Zeit über in dieser Welt {mf|mein Lotse|meine Lotsin}. Wie könnte ich Euch im letzten Augenblick den Rücken zukehren?"
languages.original_text: "You have been my guide in this world this entire time. How could I turn my back on you at the last moment?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wart die ganze Zeit über in dieser Welt {mf|mein Lotse|meine Lotsin}. Wie könnte ich Euch im letzten Augenblick den Rücken zukehren?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Depuis le temps que vous me guidez à travers les aléas de ce monde, comment pourrais-je vous tourner le dos à l'instant fatidique ? »
languages.original_text: "You have been my guide in this world this entire time. How could I turn my back on you at the last moment?"

traits.locale_text: « Depuis le temps que vous me guidez à travers les aléas de ce monde, comment pourrais-je vous tourner le dos à l'instant fatidique ? »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Bunca zaman boyunca benim bu dünyadaki kılavuzum oldun. Son anda sana nasıl sırt çevirebilirim?"
languages.original_text: "You have been my guide in this world this entire time. How could I turn my back on you at the last moment?"
